feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
